articles.description: Brydon Carse and debutant Jacob Bethell lead England to an impressive eight-wicket victory over New Zealand in the first Test in Christchurch.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Brydon Carse and Jacob Bethell seal win in Christchurch

articles.description: BBC Sport previews Sunday's massive Premier League title game between Liverpool and Manchester City at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool vs Manchester City: Things to look out for in crucial Anfield game

articles.description: As Arsenal move second with an emphatic win at West Ham, BBC Sport looks at how Martin Odegaard and Bukayo Saka are keeping their title hopes alive.
articles.title: Arsenal: Martin Odegaard and Bukayo Saka keeping Premier League title hopes alive

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen snatches pole position from Mercedes’ George Russell in the final seconds of qualifying at the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Qatar GP 2024: Max Verstappen takes first pole since June

articles.description: Watch live coverage as Atletico Mineiro face Botafogo in the 2024 Copa Libertadores final in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
articles.title: Copa Libertadores Final 2024 LIVE: Watch Atletico Mineiro v Botafogo

articles.description: Ireland head coach Andy Farrell insists he was able to park emotion as he signed off before his looming British and Irish Lions commitments with victory over Australia.
articles.title: Ireland 22-19 Australia: 'No emotion' for Andy Farrell in winning send-off before Lions sabbatical

articles.description: England's goalless draw with the USA gives a glimpse of Sarina Wiegman's plans for Euro 2025 - with some experimental setting up and a strong defensive display.
articles.title: Sarina Wiegman vowed to experiment – did USA draw show evolution?

articles.description: England crush South Africa by nine wickets in the third and final T20 in Centurion to claim a series clean sweep.
articles.title: South Africa vs England: Danni Wyatt-Hodge leads hosts to dominant T20 clean sweep

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Borussia Dortmund vs Bayern Munich in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Bayern Munich: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Olympic champion Galal Yafai puts on a masterclass to beat long-term rival Sunny Edwards and win the interim WBC flyweight title.
articles.title: Edwards vs Yafai: Galal Yafai puts on masterclass to beat Sunny Edwards
